item.title: Concepts
item.description: Loop: Looping allows you to take the same action, or set of actions, with every item in a list. range() function: Python’s ‘range()’ function makes it easy to generate a series of numbers. This is another result of the off-by-one behavior you’ll see often in programming languages.The ‘range()’ function causes Python to start counting at the first value you give it, and it stops when it reaches the second value you provide.
